-- ============================================= -- Author: LOGIN -- Create date: 10 สิงหาคม 2007 -- Description: เช็ค User Password จาก DB -- ============================================= /* declare @oStr char(1) declare @Message varchar(50) exec spl_Login 'vaccine4','virus1',@oStr output,@Message output select @oStr,@Message */ CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[spl_Login] @UserName varchar(50), @Password varchar(50), @oStr char(1) output, @Message varchar(50) output, @Position varchar(50) output AS BEGIN -- SET NOCOUNT ON added to prevent extra result sets from -- interfering with SELECT statements. SET NOCOUNT ON; declare @User varchar(50) declare @Pass varchar(50) declare @Enable char(1) SELECT @Position = b.[User_Type_Name_T] ,@User = c.[User_Code] ,@Pass = c.[User_Password] ,@Enable = 'T' FROM [MS_Activate_User] a left outer join [MS_User_Type] b on b.[User_Type_ID] = a.[User_Type_ID] left outer join [MS_User] c on c.[User_ID] = a.[User_ID] left outer join [MS_Work_Center] d on d.[Loc_ID] = a.[Loc_ID] where c.[User_Code] = @UserName
IF @Enable = 'T' begin IF @User is null begin set @oStr = '0' set @Message = 'UserName ที่ระบุไม่ถูกต้อง' end ELSE begin IF @Pass = @Password begin set @oStr = '1' set @Message = 'UserName และ Password ถูกต้อง' end ELSE begin set @oStr = '2' set @Message = 'Password ไม่ถูกต้อง' end end end ELSE begin IF @Enable = 'F' begin set @oStr = '2' set @Message = 'คุณไม่มีสิทธิ์ใช้โปรแกรมนี้แล้วกรุณาติดต่อ Admin' end end END

GO /****** Object: Table [dbo].[User] Script Date: 02/08/2008 15:25:13 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO SET ANSI_PADDING ON GO CREATE TABLE [dbo].[User]( [UserID] [varchar](50) COLLATE Thai_CI_AS NOT NULL, [UserPassword] [varchar](50) COLLATE Thai_CI_AS NOT NULL, [UserType] [char](1) COLLATE Thai_CI_AS NULL, [Enable] [char](1) COLLATE Thai_CI_AS NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_User_1] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [UserID] ASC )WITH (IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [PRIMARY] GO SET ANSI_PADDING OFF
